subSections.title: Readings
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|い}}

# {{lb|ja|historical}} under the [[w:Ritsuryō|Ritsuryō]] system of ancient Japan, an [[official]] [[document]] exchanged between officials with no direct authority over each other
